reviews.review_msg: Easily one of the best professors I have had at SFU. He is super caring, patient, and always makes time for his students. He is very flexible when it comes to office hours and is also very understanding of his students. Highly recommend!

The best prof in any university by far. Makes learning language fun and helpful. Accessible outside class where you can argue your grades in a cafe or literally anywhere. Choose your own exam dates, very little homework and excellent organization. LOVE IT!!!!
